Elements.Name: jumpDash
Description: Restores the Jump Dash, only works on the first jump.

Elements.Name: doubleJumpDash
Description: Restores the Jump Dash, only works on the second jump.

Elements.Name: stompBounce
Description: Restores the stomp bounce from Sonic Frontiers.

Elements.Name: stompBounceLightning
Description: Restores the stomp bounce third last stomp from Sonic Frontiers. Requires Stomp Bounce to be on.

Elements.Name: stompBounceFix
Description: Changes the third stomp particles to a more Shadow fitting color. Requires Stomp Bounce Lightning

Elements.Name: legacyControls
Description: Changes Jump Dash and Drift to RT. Meant to be used with the in-game Legacy controls option.
